EmailTemplate.name: 202004_APAC_Emails_VCOM_DU-1310_MC.202004_APAC_Emails_VCOM_DU-1310_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Check Out Our Latest Display Units - Now Available!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell has teamed up with VCOM Technologies Ltd to provide a one-stop shop DU-1310-2 inventory management and distribution service for customers in the Asia Pacific region. This joint-service will minimize lead time and cost in procuring such parts in-region.
As this is an on-wing upgradable option, no Supplemental Type Certificate (STC) is required but an authorized engineer could sign off subject modification.
BACKGROUND
The DU-1310 cockpit display unit provides business aviation operators equipped with the Primus Epic platform a high-resolution primary or multifunction liquid crystal display (LCD) for enhanced situational awareness. As the previous model DU1310-1 is deemed Beyond Economic Repair (BER) due to obsolescence (Reference SIL D201303000004 and SIL D201608000036), Honeywell is now introducing the new model DU1310-2.
The latest version DU1310-2 is a form, fit, function replacement for the current DU1310-1, and it is fully interchangeable and intermixable with the DU1310-1.
Please kindly see this PDF flyer <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/7260_DU-1310_Notice_bilingual_v18.pdf]]> for more details.
Click below and see how you can get the latest version DU1310-2.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/attention-gulfstream-dassault-operators?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_ch_apac_vcom_du-1310&utm_term=marketo]]>
